Sentencas: A thermodynamic evaluation of an integrated biomass catalytic gasifier-solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system has been made, as a preliminary approach to assess the technical feasibility of electrical energy production from a renewable source such as biomass.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF SOFC FUELED BY BIOMASS-DERIVED GAS

Sentencas: Equilibrium calculations have been made to predict conversion levels in a chemical reacting system including cellulose as a typical biomass feedstock and water vapor or CO2 as the gasifying agent.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF SOFC FUELED BY BIOMASS-DERIVED GAS

Sentencas: The allowable electrical efficiencies of the cellulose product-gas-fuelled SOFC have been calculated for different gasifer operating conditions, namely H2O (CO2)/biomass ratio and gasifier operating temperature.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF SOFC FUELED BY BIOMASS-DERIVED GAS

Sentencas: For a gasifier temperature of 700-degrees-C, electrical efficiencies in the SOFC are 47% and 51% for steam (steam/biomass = 1.12) and CO2(CO2/biomass = 1.30), respectively.
Titulo: THERMODYNAMIC ANALYSIS OF SOFC FUELED BY BIOMASS-DERIVED GAS
